## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8a23d19f69d28bf2065ccb50bf9a1fc3967ba78802d2506e414df22a3c3f2fe2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ohta' @ 99.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
